I am a seasoned Computational Biologist specializing in Biomedical Genomics. With extensive experience in RNAseq, Single-Cell RNAseq, and Microarray data analysis, I excel in analysis and interpretation to insight generation. I have provided technical and delivery expertise across various high-impact projects, successfully managing numerous projects in industry settings to generate actionable biological insights. I am now seeking industry roles to further drive innovation in Biomedical Genomics and bioinformatics. In my free time, I enjoy discussing Christopher Nolan films, football, and exploring causal inference.
